  • Method Details

    • add

      boolean add(E e)
      Adds a new element to the pool.
      Parameters:
      e - The element to be added to the pool.
      Returns:
      true if the element was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • add

      boolean add(E e, boolean autoDestroyOnFailedToAdd)
      Adds a new element to the pool. If the addition fails and autoDestroyOnFailedToAdd is true, the element will be destroyed.
      Parameters:
      e - The element to be added to the pool.
      autoDestroyOnFailedToAdd - If true, the element will be destroyed if it cannot be added to the pool.
      Returns:
      true if the element was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • add

      boolean add(E e, long timeout, TimeUnit unit) throws InterruptedException
      Attempts to add a new element to the pool, waiting up to the specified wait time if necessary for space to become available.
      Parameters:
      e - The element to be added to the pool.
      timeout - The maximum time to wait for space to become available.
      unit - The time unit of the timeout argument.
      Returns:
      true if the element was successfully added, false if the specified waiting time elapses before space is available.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting.

    • add

      boolean add(E e, long timeout, TimeUnit unit, boolean autoDestroyOnFailedToAdd) throws InterruptedException
      Attempts to add a new element to the pool, waiting up to the specified wait time if necessary for space to become available. If the addition fails and autoDestroyOnFailedToAdd is true, the element will be destroyed.
      Parameters:
      e - The element to be added to the pool.
      timeout - The maximum time to wait for space to become available.
      unit - The time unit of the timeout argument.
      autoDestroyOnFailedToAdd - If true, the element will be destroyed if it cannot be added to the pool.
      Returns:
      true if the element was successfully added, false if the specified waiting time elapses before space is available.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting.

    • take

      E take()
      Retrieves and removes the head of this queue, or returns null if this queue is empty.
      Returns:
      The head of the queue or null if the queue is empty.

    • take

      E take(long timeout, TimeUnit unit) throws InterruptedException
      Retrieves and removes the head of this queue, waiting up to the specified wait time if necessary. Returns null if this queue is empty after waiting for the specified time.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The maximum time to wait for an element to become available.
      unit - The time unit of the timeout argument.
      Returns:
      The head of the queue or null if the queue is empty after waiting for the specified time.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting.

    • contains

      boolean contains(E valueToFind)
      Checks if the specified element is present in the pool.
      Parameters:
      valueToFind - The element whose presence in the pool is to be tested.
      Returns:
      true if the pool contains the specified element, false otherwise.
